text:
what specifically would you like to do between those 2 services? try to be as specific as possible.

i assume it's <https://developer.ticketmaster.com/products-and-docs/apis/getting-started/|this specific api> you want to integrate with hubSpot?

hubSpot is giving you an error that your service is unavailable/unreachable when they try to ping it.

I cannot give you more information as i don't know what web service you're trying to have hubSpot send a webhook subscription to.

(Captain obvious statement: LocalHost is not a valid reachable place :wink: )

Meltano is trying to connect using <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/oauth2/oauth2-overview|Oauth> these are the things your "App" in HubSpot provides (and you can then install your app in HubSpot on a HubSpot portal.)

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/faq/how-do-i-create-an-app-in-HubSpot|link> on how to create an app.
